item.title: By: Esha Shakya
item.dc:creator: Esha Shakya
item.description: I am in love with the Crimson Ember Knitscarf! The red color is bold and beautiful, and the scarf itself is incredibly soft. It adds a touch of elegance to my winter outfits and keeps me warm on cold days. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a stylish and cozy scarf.
item.content:encoded: I am in love with the Crimson Ember Knitscarf! The red color is bold and beautiful, and the scarf itself is incredibly soft. It adds a touch of elegance to my winter outfits and keeps me warm on cold days. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a stylish and cozy scarf.

item.title: By: Manisha Joshi
item.dc:creator: Manisha Joshi
item.description: The Crimson Ember Knitscarf is absolutely stunning! The rich red color is so vibrant and eye-catching. The quality of the wool is fantastic, keeping me warm and cozy. I receive compliments every time I wear it, and it's become my favorite winter accessory.
item.content:encoded: The Crimson Ember Knitscarf is absolutely stunning! The rich red color is so vibrant and eye-catching. The quality of the wool is fantastic, keeping me warm and cozy. I receive compliments every time I wear it, and it’s become my favorite winter accessory.
